captions.text: "Your and my story is the same."

"The whole world is asleep,
lost in dreams."

"The whole world is asleep,
lost in dreams."

"Come, let's talk
and spend the night."

comments.author: Ali Rashid

comments.text:
One of the gems of Hindi film music. You get an out of the world feeling. I 
had heard it in the early seventies as a young boy. Didn't know it was 
created by Rahul Dev Burman. Knew it is Hindi, that's all. Both the 
versions by Lata and Kishore are sweet. The lady Sadhana is so sweet I wish 
I had married her in her young age, though she is much elder than me!. She 
represents the womanhood I worship. What sweetness, what dignity, what lean 
figure...No words of praise are enough for this. Great﻿
comments.author: Aslam Muhammad

comments.text: The lady is Radha Saluja, not Sadhana. She acted in very few films.

SONG.

comments.author: tintunbirha

comments.text:
One of the gems of Hindi film music. You get an out of the world feeling. I 
had heard it in the early seventies as a young boy. Didn't know it was 
created by Rahul Dev Burman. Knew it is Hindi, that's all. Both the 
versions by Lata and Kishore are sweet. The lady Sadhana is so sweet I wish 
I had married her in her young age, though she is much elder than me!. She 
represents the womanhood I worship. What sweetness, what dignity, what lean 
figure...No words of praise are enough for this. Great!
comments.author: bimbuj
